p: One anti-virus drug against arenavirus infection has been identified: Ribavirin® is an anti-viral drug that interferes with RNA viral replication. It has been proved to be an efficient treatment against LASV if administered early and might in some cases also be effective against other arenaviruses including BHF, Sabía virus or Lujo virus. Also it has been shown to be effective in advanced stages of LASV infection by reducing the virus load (McCormick et al. 1986; Barry et al. 1995; Enria et al. 1994; Kilgore et al. 1997, Briese et al. 2009).
